ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 18
ygData.msgSnippet: I made lvl 12 in nro exclusively, basically hunting scarabs and tarantulas (desert, not dune) and taking the occasional mummy if the occasion arose. The key to
ygData.messageBody:
I made lvl 12 in nro exclusively, basically hunting scarabs and tarantulas
(desert, not dune) and taking the occasional mummy if the occasion arose.
The key to success at level 11, is keep casting your pet until you get the
high level one that has bash, test him out on something weak (fire beetles
etc) if he bashes, he's a keeper, if he doesn't reclaim energy and try
again, he should /con blue.

----- Original Message -----
From: John & Heather Summers <dualdocs@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 11:49 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Digest Number 18


> From: "John & Heather Summers" <dualdocs@...>
>
> Greetings,
>
> I am a struggling level 11 necromancer. I hunt primarily in east and west
> commons and NRO and am having a terrible time getting exp. The only
things
> that con white or yellow that i can take are young kodiaks. The orcs and
> dervish consistently frenzy on me and kill me. Lavastorm has been good
but
> I have problems finding a good tank reliably. Any suggestions on hunting
> locales or on how to not frenzy orcs or dervish (these are the only MOBS
> that do this to me). Thanks.
